concept.title: What is SensorFocus
concept.text:
SensorFocus is a complete IoT and advanced analytics platform offered as a service in the cloud.

SensorFocus gives access to the power of some of the most powerful machine learning (e.g. Scikit-learn), computer vision (e.g. OpenCV 3.0) and data analytics (e.g. Pandas) in one single integrated environment.

We offers real time data streaming and management capabilities based on MQTT and Celery.

companies.caption: Users from these world class organizations are using our solutions.

app.title: App Section
app.text: Simple and intuitive “Facebook” like news feed. You get a news feed that is tailored to your solution and personalized to your needs.

items.cta: TV real time status so you know they agree to your house rules.
How many hours was watched today, this week, this month.
Hourly summary of the last 7 days and last month.
Daily pattern of TV consumption so you can change the routin.

items.title: Technicians and Engineers
items.text: Test drive IoT in your company. Monitor equipments in real time and get results quick.

items.title: Geeks and Hobbyists
items.text: You like to play with Ardruino and Rasberry Pi? SensorFocus brings your project to the next level with its API combined to a complete real time data management platform.

items.title: Scientists and Researchers
items.text: You have some lab project that require data acquisition from sensors? SensorFocus helps you get results faster at rate of up to 100Hz.

items.title: Sciences Teachers
items.text: SensorFocus helps illustrate physics at its best with real time demonstration and ubiquitous sensors available on any android phones. Contact us to hear about our educational discounts.

items.title: Artists
items.text: looking to easily create amazing arts without having to bother with complex technology? SensorFocus might offer exactly what you are looking for.

items.title: Sensors
items.text: Real time sensor input with MQTT connectivity. Up to 100Hz per series. Camera enabled. Wifi and LTE/3G communication. Android based devices.

items.title: Connections
items.text: Secure API connectivity to proprietary databases (e.g. SAP, Oracle, CRM), open data sources (e.g. Census) and other sources such as websites.

items.title: API
items.text: Secured REST based API available to third party. Enable use of DIY sensor platform such as Rasbery Pi and Arduino.

items.title: Excel
items.text: Excel connectivity via real time data server. Allow for manual input in spread sheets.

items.title: Analytics
items.text: Cloud based data manipulation and analytics platform. Command line interface to Pandas Python.

items.title: Machine Learning
items.text: Enable training and automatic state detection. Implement key machine learning modules from ScikitLearnand Google’s TensorFlow.

items.title: Image Analysis
items.text: Implement key image analysis routines: movement, heatmap, object detection.

items.title: Alerts & Scheduler
items.text: Condition based alert systems implementing a distributed task queue. Allows for the implementation of condition logics and state machines. Automatically triggers device actions, tasks, user notifications.

items.title: Dashboards
items.text: Flexible, command line implementation of D3JS visualization. Allows for public and private sharing.

items.title: Maps
items.text: Implementation of Google maps to visualize social data. (e.g. fleet tracking)

items.title: API
items.text: Secure data connection allowing for use of data at scale. Integrates with third party tools such as Tableau and Alterix.

items.title: Task Management
items.text: Task / Service ticket management tools including notification and work schedule management.

items.title: News Feed
items.text: Facebook like news feed integrating all other data sinks into one interface. Enable the digital enterprise paradigm with mobile devices.

items.title: Device Actions
items.text: Device side actions allowing for interactions with the real world (e.g. warning message, visual display). HTTP request enabling connection to third party systems.

screens.title: Screenshot Section
screens.text: Get all your info that matters in one place in a simple and intuitive “Facebook” like news feed.

support.title: Documenta­tion & Support
support.text:
We are continually working on documentation and adding to it every week.

If you have any questions our friendly developers will be happy to help.

items.title: Secured solution
items.text: We work with Amazon Servers, most trusted secure solution.

items.title: Social
items.text: Easy to share content in social networks.

items.title: Easy to use
items.text: Our solution is designed to be used by everyone, not only experts.

items.title: Easy to install
items.text: The complete solution can be installed in a matter of minutes.

items.title: Green
items.text: Bring your old phones back to life!

items.title: Fun
items.text: Get notifications and pictures of the most important events.
